title: What are the benefits of learning math, as a general rule? - Quora

response.answer_text: As we all know study of mathematics develops the problem solving skills. Every problem contains its own solution. But you have to approach in a proper manner. With this, study of mathematics prepares you to solve the problems of life with confidence.Mathematics develops computational skills.Helps to develop organizing the things systematically. To solve a problem you should solve the equations step by step.Develops manipulative skills.Develops functional skills in numerical ability.Develops logic and reasoning.Teaches synthesis and analysis. In life if you come across a complex problem you have to make it parts and solve and then integrate to find the final solution.Develops to make proper assumptions by keen observation of circumstances and check whether the assumptions are correct.Develops the discriminatory power.Sharpens the brain. I mean you can think faster than your peers.Develops aesthetic sense - in mathematics you will learn symmetry and beauty lies in symmetry.Presentation skills- By studying the graphs you will know how to present your argument in a simple and more effective way so that every one can understand.Develops analytical skills. In life situations some times the problems seems to be complicated, the analytical skills developed by the study of mathematics will come handy to analyse the problem without losing the cool and get the best solution.Above all develops patience and discipline.Mathematics is basis for the study of sciences, engineering, architecture,computers,accounts,fashion designing and many more subjects.
